name: Purpur (Autoupdating v2.0)
author: pterodactyl@jcxldn.net
description: Purpur is a fork of Paper and Tuinity with the goal of providing new and interesting configuration options, which allow for creating a unique gameplay experience not seen anywhere else

variables.name: (Optional) Purpur version
variables.description:
The version of purpur to download. 

Leave blank to always get the latest (stable) versions.

variables.name: (Optional) Override Jar Path
variables.description: Set this value to the path of a jar (/home/container/$X) to skip the automatic download and run it directly.
